articles.title: DPRK Will Not Deal with Lee Myung Bak: Spokesman for NDC of DPRK
articles.content:
DPRK Will Not Deal with Lee Myung Bak: Spokesman for NDC of DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- The moves of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to escalate confrontation with the DPRK have reached an extreme phase. A spokesman for the National Defence Commission of the DPRK issued a statement condemning them on Monday.
					 The group is doing sordid things only while escalating the accusation of the headquarters of our revolution and the sacred socialist system, reminding one of a puppy knowing no fear of the tiger, the statement notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors fakes up false stories and whitewashes its misrule, undermining national reconciliation and unity and deliberately laying a hurdle in the way of peace and prosperity. 
					
					 It is impertinently talking about what it called "true intention" of the "Berlin proposal", crying out for somebody's dismantlement of nukes and apology for no reason. It is busy pulling up the DPRK under the pretext of false case and over its legitimate measures for self-defence, driving the inter-Korean relations to uncontrollable catastrophe. 
					
					 The group went the lengths of malignantly slandering the DPRK's magnanimous proposal for bringing about a new phase of reconciliation, cooperation, peace and reunification through wide-ranging dialogue and negotiations without any pre-conditions in a bid to create impression among the domestic and foreign public that its delaying tactics would help "contingency" occur as it desires.
					
					 During his recent trip to Japan he made no scruple of taking issue with the DPRK's nuclear issue and back in Seoul he even said that he would try to persuade someone with "affection", the statement said, and continued:
					
					 It was against this backdrop that the puppet military warmongers hurled a great number of soldiers into holding firing exercises in ranges in Yangju and Inchon Kyonggi Province from May 23.
					
					 And anti-DPRK conservative forces of south Korea during their foreign trip described the May 18 Kwangju massacre as "an act done by a special unit of the north" though it was perpetrated by the Chun Doo Hwan military fascists.
					
					 The statement clarified internally and externally the following principled stand of the DPRK:
					
					1. The army and people of the DPRK will never deal with traitor Lee Myung Bak and his clan. 
					
					 It is our stand to let them wait for "contingency" as long as they please according to their "waiting strategy," sticking to their "theory of principle" on the basis of their own judgment till they face their self-destruction. 
					
					2. The DPRK will launch a nationwide offensive to put an end to the moves of the Lee group to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK. 
					
					 The all-out offensive of the army and people of the DPRK is a merciless one. 
					
					 The trend of the times will prove that hot waves for genuine democracy will rage in the base of the group. 
					
					3. The army and people of the DPRK for the present will take practical actions to cope with the confrontation racket of the group. 
					
					 As the group put a check bar on reconciliation and cooperation, denying dialogue and contacts, the Korean People's Army will cut off the north-south military communication in the area along the east coast which has been maintained to provide a military guarantee for the north-south passage and close the communication liaison office in Mt. Kumgang area as the first step. 
					
					 As already warned by the DPRK, it will take a physical action without any notice any time against any target to cope with the anti-DPRK psychological warfare persistently perpetrated by the group with a foolish aim.

articles.title: Vietnam Will Never Forget DPRK's Support--PM
articles.content:
Vietnam Will Never Forget DPRK's Support--PM
						
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- The Vietnamese party, government and people always remember and are grateful for the precious support rendered by the Korean party, government and people to the realization of Vietnam's liberation and reunification.
					 The prime minister of Vietnam said this on May 25 when Kim Chang Il, DPRK ambassador to his country, paid a courtesy call on him.
					
					 We sincerely congratulate last year's successful Conference of the Workers' Party of Korea and wish the Korean people greater victory in building a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, he said.
					
					 Expressing support for the Korean party and government in the efforts to realize the peaceful reunification of the country, he said that it is the firm stand of Vietnam to give steady importance to the traditional relations with the DRRK and practically develop them in political, economic and all other fields.

articles.title: French Delegation Here
articles.content:
French Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the French Group for the Study of the DPRK headed by Jean-Claude Frecon, senator from the Socialist Party and chairman of the group of the Senate, arrived here on Monday. The delegation is made up of senators from various political parties.

articles.title: Paektusan Power Station Construction Moves Ahead
articles.content:
Paektusan Power Station Construction Moves Ahead
						
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- A great progress has been made in the construction of the Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station over the past one year. Power Station No. 1 already started operation and the projects of Power Stations Nos. 2 and 3 are moving ahead rapidly.
					 The builders carried out the construction of a dam, waterway tunnel, intake tower, surge tank and drainage opening of Power Station No. 1. 
					
					 They finished the construction of the power station more than six months earlier than schedule. 
					
					 In the Power Station No. 2 project, they have already completed the expansion of surge tank substructure, construction of ground pressure conduit, excavation of the generator room and some 10,000 cubic meters of earth filling. The Power Station No. 3 project is also progressing apace.
					
					 At least 20 technological inventions have been applied to the projects.

articles.title: Young People Volunteer to Laborious Jobs
articles.content:
Young People Volunteer to Laborious Jobs
Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- An estimated 19,000 young men and women have volunteered to laborious jobs in different economic sectors in the DPRK from the beginning of the year.
					 Fourteen young workers of the Tanchon Mining Industry Construction Complex volunteered to join in the gasification project of the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, 31 graduates from Phyongsong University of Education in the nature-driven drainage opening construction of the Sunchon Area Youth Coal Mining Complex, graduates from Pyongyang Jangchung and Puksu secondary schools in the Komdok Mining Complex and graduates from Kaechok Secondary School in Taehongdan County in the construction of the Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station. 
					
					 An Hye Song, a graduate from the Life Science Faculty of Kim Il Sung University, took a job in the Sowon Cooperative Farm in Pyoksong County, Jong Su Rim, a graduate from Pyongyang Agricultural College of Kim Il Sung University, in the Rihyon Vegetable Farm in Sadong District and Om Su Jong, a worker of the Changsong County Urban Construction Office, in the Insan Cooperative Farm in Changsong County.  
					
					 Seventy-two graduates from Wonsan Orphans' Middle School found their jobs at light industry factories.
					
					 Many secondary school graduates in Pyongyang volunteered to work with floricultural farms and Pyongyang Textile Mill.

articles.title: Immuno-activator Preventing Radioactive, Sandy Dust Damages
articles.content:
Immuno-activator Preventing Radioactive, Sandy Dust Damages
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- Kumdang-2 Injection, a strong immuno-activator, caught visitors' eyes at the 14th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair held from May 16 to 19. The medicine is manufactured by the Korea Pugang Pharmaceutic Co., Ltd. 
					 General Manager of the company Jon Sung Hun told KCNA that the injection, a highly catalyzed insam (ginseng) saccharide, enjoys popularity in local and foreign markets. 
					
					 "In particular, the Asia-Pharma Co., Ltd. of Mongolia, our company's sole regional agent which has been distributing more than 20,000 packets every month in Mongolia and its neighbors, has ordered greater quantity this month," he said, adding: 
					
					 The clients said the injection, which has proved efficacious for avian influenza, New Flu and other epidemics, is now popular for its effects for preventing radioactive and sandy dust damages. 
					
					 According to clinical records from other countries, among the Kumdang-2 injected patients who underwent up to some 5 Grays of radioactive rays during radiotherapy, etc. no radioactive damage has been witnessed. The injection also helps improve immunity in human body to keep eyes and respiratory organs from being damaged by sandy dust. Nowadays we see a world-wide trend of using this injection.
					
					 Kumdang-2 Injection, which has saved many people from diseases and contributed to the health of mankind, is registered with the ministries of health of Cuba, Syria, Mongolia, Germany and other countries. The demand for this injection is ever growing in many countries.

articles.title: Soccer Friendly Held between Women's Teams of DPRK and Germany
articles.content:
Soccer Friendly Held between Women's Teams of DPRK and Germany
						
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- A soccer friendly was held between women's teams of the DPRK and Germany in a local city of Germany in the run-up to the 2011 Women's World Cup.
					 The women's team of the DPRK accumulated certain experience in tactics and operation through the match.
					
					 The DPRK team will compete with its Colombian, Swedish and U.S. rivals in Group C in the Women's World Cup which will kick off in Germany on June 26.

articles.title: Ideological, Theoretical Exploits of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Ideological, Theoretical Exploits of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il published a famous work "On Some Problems of the Ideological Foundation of Socialism" on May 30, Juche 79 (1990).
					 At the end of the 20th century, the imperialists and renegade socialists advertised the "end" of socialism, claiming that the idea of socialism was wrong and the socialist revolution was a mistake.
					
					 Their smear campaign caused vacillation and confusion among some people and misunderstanding of socialism among some nations aspiring after socialism.
					
					 Such being the situation, Kim Jong Il published the work to give correct answers to the issue concerning the ideological foundation of socialism.
					
					 In the work he writes that the DPRK successfully solved the issue of consolidating and developing the ideological foundation of socialism. He also says the situation proves the socialist cause can be carried forward successfully only based on the ideology, theory and method of Juche.
					
					 He lays bare the reactionary nature of modern social democracy, which led to the degeneration of socialism and revival of capitalism. He declares modern social democracy is doomed to ruin like all sorts of opportunism
					
					as it is a product of an illusion about capitalism and surrender to imperialism.
					
					 The work provides a way to be followed by the progressive people and injects vitality in the movement for rebuilding socialism.

articles.title: Patriotic Life Dedicated to Country
articles.content:
Patriotic Life Dedicated to Country    
						
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- May 31 marks the 135th birth anniversary of Ri Po Ik, grandmother of President Kim Il Sung.
					 She still remains in the memory of the Korean people for her life dedicated to the country and the people.
					
					 Born into a poor peasant's family in 1876, she encouraged her sons to take part in revolutionary activities against the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule.
					
					 When her son Kim Hyong Jik, an indomitable revolutionary fighter, was put behind bars by the Japanese imperialists, she called up his courage.
					
					 After Kim Hyong Jik passed away in Juche 15 (1926), she went to Fusong in China to inspire the President to devote himself to achieving the independence of Korea.
					
					 She was never affected by any high-handed and unjust practice.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists took her to vast areas of Manchuria for nearly one year, pressing her to persuade the President to stop the anti-Japanese armed struggle. But she categorically rejected their demand, undaunted by their menace.  
					
					 She always lived with the belief that Korea would surely be liberated from the Japanese colonial rule.

articles.title: US Forces' Burial of Poisonous Substances Blasted
articles.content:
US Forces' Burial of Poisonous Substances Blasted
						
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that the U.S. forces in south Korea massively buried defoliant and other poisonous chemical materials in their base in Chilgok County, North Kyongsang Province, sparking uproar. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a by-lined commentary in this regard: 
					
					 The disclosed fact provides a clear testimony that the U.S. does not care whether south Koreans die due to poisonous materials or not.
					
					 The above-said crime can happen only in such deplorable master- servant relationship as that between the U.S. and south Korea. 
					
					 The pro-U.S. lackeys of south Korea have kowtowed to the U.S. as their savior. It is their way of thinking that they can neither stay in power nor prolong their remaining days without the U.S. backing.
					
					 The group of Lee Myung Bak is a group of pro-U.S. lackeys without parallel in history. No sooner had this group come to power than considered it as its "top priority task to reinforce the alliance with the U.S." and made desperate efforts to do harm to fellow countrymen under the U.S. patronage. 
					
					 The group has sacrificed a lot of interests of the south Korean people to serve it. 
					
					 Since the disclosure of the hideous case the Lee clan has not uttered even a word of complaint about the U.S. The group is talking about "joint investigation" and the like but when the U.S. says "No," it has no option but to hush the case up. It is quite foolish for the group to expect from the U.S. any fair probe into the case or reparation for it as its fate is to be decided by it.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Kim Il Sung's Line of National Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Kim Il Sung's Line of National Reunification
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's line of national reunification is a thorough line of national independence for achieving the full-fledged sovereignty and independence of the country and the nation. It is also a genuine line of patriotism for the prosperity and development of reunified country and the prosperity of the whole nation. 
					 The DPRK's major newspaper Rodong Sinmun Monday stresses this in a bylined article.
					
					 The article says:
					
					 The three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo are the three charters for national reunification in which the President systematized in an integrated way and comprehended the basic principles and ways for Korea's reunification on the basis of the great Juche idea and experience he gained in the course of the struggle for national reunification. 
					
					 The three charters are brilliant embodiment and precious fruition of the line of national independence. 
					
					 With these charters the Korean nation could dynamically advance the movement for national reunification without any deviation under the banner of independence. All the proposals laid down by the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government are based on the three charters and subordinated to strictly implementing them.
					
					 The President put forward the Koreans as the driving force of national reunification and provided a sure guarantee for accomplishing the cause of reunification by the nation itself on the principle of self-determination. Herein lay the validity and vitality of his line of national reunification.
					
					 The three principles, advanced by the President, is a great reunification program common to the nation the north and the south confirmed and solemnly declared in the July 4 joint statement.
					
					 The ten-point programme displays its might as a great political platform encouraging all Koreans to the great unity and the nationwide reunification movement.
					
					 The DFRK founding proposal is a bright blueprint that shows the full picture of a unified state and the way for its realization and the straightest road for national prosperity. The proposal for founding a national unified state by means of federation based on one nation, one state, two systems and two governments is the unique and reasonable formula that makes it possible to realize Korea's reunification in the fairest way and smoothly on the condition that the north and the south tolerate each other's ideology and system.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Defense Reform Rejected
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Defense Reform Rejected
						
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- The defense reform pushed forward by the south Korean puppet group met strong rebuff from the people.
					 Members of the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification staged a demonstration outside the building of the puppet Ministry of Defense on May 26. They brought to light the unreasonableness of the reform proposal set forth by the authorities and strongly demanded its withdrawal.
					
					 On May 17 generals on reserve duty of the puppet navy and air forces refused to attend a ministry briefing on the reform proposal.

articles.title: US Forces Command Defoliant Spraying--S. Koreans
articles.content:
US Forces Command Defoliant Spraying- S. Koreans 
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- Defoliant was sprayed in the Demilitarized Zone of south Korea under the command of the U.S. forces present in south Korea. A Korean in the U.S. opened to the public a document certifying to it.
					 The document called "established rule over plant control" was conveyed in secrecy to the U.S. military base in Wonju by the U.S. Forces Command in south Korea on March 30, 1968.
					
					 It contained an order of the representative of the U.S. military advisory group on offering technological guidance and support to the puppet army to be mobilized for the work.
					
					 Also contained were the method of spraying defoliant, the method of adjusting equipment after spraying and the issue of distributing an interpreter for communication between the representative and the spraying group.
					
					 It also had records asking for not reporting the coordinates of those areas.
					
					 Meanwhile, a south Korean inhabitant, who had worked in the U.S. military base in Waegwan, Chilgok County, North Kyongsang Province for more than three decades from the late 1960s, exposed the U.S. forces' burial of defoliant on May 27, south Korean MBC said.

articles.title: Revision of Unequal S. Korea-US SOFA Demanded
articles.content:
Revision of Unequal S. Korea-US SOFA Demanded 
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Kyunghyang Daily News on May 26 editorially called for an immediate revision of the unequal south Korea-U.S. SOFA.
					 A series of new testimonies have been made recently to the U.S. forces' burial of defoliant and the U.S. set about investigating the case but this is not enough, the editorial said, and continued:
					
					 What is essential and important for probing the truth about the burial of defoliant is to revise the south Korea-U.S. SOFA.
					
					 According to the present SOFA, south Korea has no right to make an independent investigation no matter how seriously the U.S. forces pollute environment in their base.
					
					 If the U.S. has an intention to make a sincere apology for its environmental pollution, it should opt for the revision of the unequal SOFA.
					
					 The "government," availing itself of this opportunity, should grasp from a new angle the seriousness of the environmental pollution in the U.S. forces base and demand the U.S. revise the SOFA.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group Seized with Uneasiness about Irregularities and Corruption
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group Seized with Uneasiness about Irregularities and Corruption 
Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- Cases of irregularities and corruption are now being disclosed one after another within the ruling quarters of the south Korean puppet group, south Korean MBC reported.
					 The scandal of Un Jin Su, former member of the puppet Board of Audit and Inspection, has been disclosed recently.
					
					 He known as a confidant of Lee Myung Bak, lined his pocket with a fabulous amount of money several times after becoming a member of the above-said board in February 2009 before working at a bank in Pusan.
					
					 He let his elder brother find a job at a hotel on Jeju Island by an illicit method, causing uproar.
					
					 Many politicians are being involved in this case.
					
					 The puppet group feels very uneasy as it is in the grip of a more serious crisis due to irregularities and corruption in the closing period of its office.

articles.title: Joint Investigation with US Forces into Defoliant Case Opposed
articles.content:
Joint Investigation with US Forces into Defoliant Case Opposed
						
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea in a commentary on May 25 voiced opposition to the joint investigation with the U.S. forces in south Korea into the defoliant case.
					 There have been recently a series of shocking news that defoliant spray continued till the 1970s and it involved not only the Demilitarized Zone but the whole of south Korea, the commentary noted, and continued:
					
					 The disclosure was made of more cases of storing of defoliant not only in the U.S. forces base in Waegwan but various other bases and spray of it in areas around the places they were stationed. In a word, the U.S. forces committed the war crimes against all the people of south Korea.
					
					 It is hypocrisy to conduct a joint investigation into the above-said crimes with this shameless group.
					
					 If the defoliant case is to be correctly probed, the authorities should reject the U.S. forces' intervention, form a special investigation team single-handed and immediately launch an investigation.
					
					 It warned that it would never overlook the war crimes committed by the U.S. forces against civilians.

articles.title: Withdrawal of US Forces from S. Korea Demanded
articles.content:
Withdrawal of US Forces from S. Korea Demanded
						
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Internet paper Jaju Minbo on May 24 carried an article titled "U.S., group of criminals who committed indelible crimes against our nation. U.S. forces, go home."
					 It was disclosed again recently that the U.S. forces committed a germ warfare in the past Korean War, drawing attention at home and abroad, the article said.
					
					 It is very shocking that the germ warfare waged by the U.S. forces was confirmed by a testimony made by a south Korean inhabitant who served at their unit during the last Korean war.
					
					 It went on:
					
					The U.S. Seventh Armored Division administered medicines to all its soldiers and inoculated them for four days but they suffered from high fever after being injected in Soksa-ri, Phyongchang County, south Korean Kangwon Province in March 1951, he said.
					
					 When he went to Taehwa, Phyongchang County later, he found countless number of people dead with no wound and a lot of flies on the dead bodies.
					
					 In the light of his testimonies one could not rule out the possibility of deaths caused by the germ warfare.
					
					 When an organization related to the UN surveyed areas of the north after being informed of the above-said warfare in those days, it found flies moving on the snow in winter and rats with white lines on their backs rare to be seen on the Korean Peninsula. On this basis, the organization submitted to the U.N. an official survey report that the U.S. forces dropped germ bombs.
					
					 Foreign experts also testified to the fact that those who served in Japanese Unit 731 were mobilized to help the U.S. in its germ warfare and that it denied the fact but there is no doubt that the U.S. committed the germ warfare in the Korean War.
					
					 The U.S. should open to the public the truth about the germ warfare and all its documents and should not only apologize for this but make state reparation for it.

articles.title: Decision on Convening World Conference on Juche Idea Supported in Thailand
articles.content:
Decision on Convening World Conference on Juche Idea Supported in Thailand
						
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- Thai organizations made public statements on May 23 in support of the decision of the 13th enlarged meeting of the Executive Committee of the Board of Directors of the International Institute of the Juche Idea.
					 The Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand said in its statement that President Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea in his early years and applied it in all domains of the Korean revolution, thus performing great feats.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il is wisely guiding the Korean people in the drive to build a thriving nation under the banner of the Juche idea, it said, adding:
					
					 We will further activate the study and dissemination of the Juche idea and commemorate the Day of the Sun in 2012 as a grand political festival.
					
					 The Thai Preparatory Committee for Commemorating the Centenary of Birth of President Kim Il Sung said in its statement that it would make positive contribution to conveying the feats of the President through more brisk study and dissemination of the Juche idea.

articles.title: Nepali Paper on Philosophical Principle of Juche Idea
articles.content:
Nepali Paper on Philosophical Principle of Juche Idea
Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- The May 20th issue of Nepali newspaper Arpan carried a photo of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and an article introducing the philosophical principle of the Juche idea.
					 The article said that the Juche idea raises the fundamental problem of philosophy centering on man and clarifies the philosophical principle that man is the master of everything and decides everything.
					
					 The idea also expounds that man is a social being with independence, creativity and consciousness, it stressed.
					
					 Noting that the idea establishes the man-centered outlook on the world on the basis of new analysis into the intrinsic nature and position and role of man in the world, the article said, describing the Juche-based outlook on the world as the most correct one in the present era.

articles.title: Important Day of DPRK Marked in Russia and Ukraine
articles.content:
Important Day of DPRK Marked in Russia and Ukraine
Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- Seminars, lectures and film shows took place in Russia and Ukraine on May 23 and 24 on the occasion of the 47th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Korean films shown included "The Party Founding Memorial Tower".
					
					 The chairman of the Russian Association for Development of Friendship and Cooperation with Foreign Countries said that the WPK has further developed into invincible vanguard ranks under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Socialism collapsed in the former Soviet Union and east European countries but the DPRK has invariably preserved it thanks to the WPK led by him, the chairman added.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Russian Union of Writers referred to the exploits performed by Kim Jong Il for Korea's reunification.
					
					 After watching a Korean film, the president of a Ukrainian company said that they became convinced through admirable events taking place in the DPRK that the WPK headed by Kim Jong Il has guided the country and people in the most correct and experienced way.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
						
Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- The Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia brought out in booklet General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" on May 25.
					 The work, published on Oct. 2, 1995, reviews the glorious history of the WPK which paved a new road for revolutionary party building in the era of independence under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It is an immortal programme for party building and activities as it shows the way for developing the WPK into the eternal party of the President.

articles.title: Damage by Radiation Remains Serious in Japan
articles.content:
Damage by Radiation Remains Serious in Japan 
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- Damage by radiation caused by the accident at the Fukushima Nuclear Power Plant in Japan still remains serious. 
					 The Jiji Press of Japan, quoting the results of the survey made by the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology on May 28, reported that radioactive cesium-137 of 320 Bq per kg of earth was detected on the seabed about 30 km away from the waters off Fukushima Prefecture.
					
					 Detected in addition to this was radioactive cesium-134 of 260 Bq per kg of seabed earth as well as radioactive iodine-131.
					
					 The above-said ministry said that radioactive materials several hundred times what was surveyed in ordinary times were detected on the seabed of the waters 300 km away from the power plant, adding that this is likely to affect seafood.
					
					 At a time when the contamination of sea water remains serious, the Japanese Asahi Shimbun said that 90 per cent of radioactive cesium that had dropped on the ground after its leakage from the power plant stays five cm from the surface of the ground. 
					
					 In the meantime, the Tokyo Electric Power Co. announced that the level of water in the pressure vessel dropped two hours after the occurrence of the killer quake, leading to the exposure of fuel rods and one hour later the temperature sharply rose in the reactor, damaging nuclear fuel.
					
					 This confirmed the fact that the power plant found itself in an awful situation right after the occurrence of the quake. 
					
					  With the season of typhoon approaching, there grows the concern that the radioactive substance that leaked from the power plant may move to the Korean Peninsula by force of typhoon.

articles.title: Japan: Ozawa Urges Resignation of PM
articles.content:
Japan: Ozawa Urges Resignation of PM
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- Ichiro Ozawa, former president of the Democratic Party of Japan, in an interview with a newspaper on Friday urged Prime Minister Naoto Kan to step down at once.
					 Noting that Kan is trying to maintain the post, Ozawa said: Anxiety and frustration are growing. I think the sooner he's replaced the better.

articles.title: Chinese Vice-Premier Calls for More Efforts to Ensure Stable Grain Output
articles.content:
Chinese Vice-Premier Calls for More Efforts to Ensure Stable Grain Output 
 Beijing, May 28 (KCNA) -- Chinese Vice-Premier Hui Liangyu called for intensified efforts to raise grain production during his recent tour of Hebei Province.
					 The regions affected by the persistent drought should take all necessary measures to ensure a stable supply of water for production, Hui said.
					
					 He encouraged farmers to improve the way their fields are managed and called for preparations against disaster weather, intensifying early warning of drought and rains so as to reduce losses from disasters to the lowest level.

articles.title: National Congress of Association for Science and Technology Opens in China
articles.content:
National Congress of Association for Science and Technology Opens in China
						
 Beijing, May 28 (KCNA) -- The Eighth National Congress of the China Association for Science and Technology opened at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing on May 27. 
					 Present there were President Hu Jintao and senior party and state officials. 
					
					 Xi Jinping, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of China and vice-president of China, delivered a speech at the congress. 
					
					 He noted that in the past five years the Association played a key role in ensuring the steady and relatively fast development of the country's economy and improving people's livelihoods, making positive contribution to building a comprehensively well-off society and speeding up the construction of an innovative state. 
					
					 He called on the Association to push forward the country's innovation drive while promoting scientific literacy among the public.

articles.title: Fostering View on Value of Revolutionary Soldier Urged in China
articles.content:
Fostering View on Value of Revolutionary Soldier Urged in China 
						
 Beijing, May 28 (KCNA) -- Xu Caihou, vice-chairman of China's Central Military Commission who is member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party, at roundtable talks on ideological and political education of the whole army Friday underlined the need to hold fast to the work for fostering the view on core value of revolutionary soldier in the present era.
					 He said that soldiers should be educated to have a strong ideological foundation for acting under the Party's direction with firm ideal and faith and thus obey the command of the Party Central Committee and the Central Military Commission and President Hu Jintao to the last under any circumstances.
					
					 He urged the party committees to steadily intensify this work through detailed arrangements and guidance.

articles.title: Seminar on Party and Army Building Held in China
articles.content:
Seminar on Party and Army Building Held in China
						
 Beijing, May 28 (KCNA) -- A seminar on building communist party and army recently took place in Beijing on the occasion of the 90th birthday of the Communist Party of China.
					 The seminar was cosponsored by the History Society of the CPC and the center for the study of the army and party history and the party building of National Defense University.
					
					 It stressed the fundamental principle arising in maintaining the absolute leadership of the party on the army and the issue of propelling the scientific development of the army building.

articles.title: Russian President on Protection of Children's Health
articles.content:
Russian President on Protection of Children's Health
						
 Moscow, May 28 (KCNA) -- Russian President Dmitri Medvedev at a meeting on May 24 referred to the issue of protecting the children's health.
					  What is important here is to furnish infantile hospitals with advanced homemade technical equipment, he said, underscoring the need to build an enterprise in the country to produce such equipment.
					
					 He also stressed that it is needed to turn out quality medicines for children.

articles.title: Indonesian President Calls on NAM to Be More Proactive in 21st Century
articles.content:
Indonesian President Calls on NAM to Be More Proactive in 21st Century
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- Indonesian President Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono, speaking at the meeting of foreign ministers of the Non-Aligned Countries on May 25, called on the Non-Aligned Movement (NAM) to be more proactive to help sharp the new world of the 21st century.
					 He referred to the positive struggle waged by the NAM to build a more wonderful new world for the past half a century.
					
					 The NAM speaking for the interests of developing countries should further enhance its role for the world peace, security, development and prosperity in the future, he noted.

articles.title: Former Mossad Chief Opposes Israeli Authorities' Attempt
articles.content:
Former Mossad Chief Opposes Israeli Authorities' Attempt
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- Former Mossad chief Meir Dagan, at a forum on May 25, declared his stand against the Israeli authorities' attempt to block the founding of an independent state of Palestine. 
					 "Israel will be mistaken to attempt to block the September move and the UN's expected recognition of a Palestinian state," he said.

articles.title: Iran Accuses US and West of Their Sanctions
articles.content:
Iran Accuses US and West of Their Sanctions
						
 Tehran, May 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Iranian Ministry of Foreign Affairs in an interview on May 26 bitterly accused the U.S. and the West of their persistent sanctions against his country.
					 The U.S. and the West are scheming to steadily tighten the sanctions and pressure on Iran over its nuclear development for peaceful purposes, he said, adding that Iran's efforts to gain nuclear energy were among the nation's absolute rights.
					
					 He reiterated the peaceful nature of Iran's nuclear activities.

articles.title: More NATO Soldiers Killed in Afghanistan
articles.content:
More NATO Soldiers Killed in Afghanistan
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- More NATO soldiers are meeting deaths in Afghanistan due to the offensive operation of the resistance forces in the country.
					 Seven NATO service members were killed in an improvised explosive device attack in southern Afghanistan on May 26.
					
					 More than 190 NATO-led soldiers have been killed in Afghanistan since beginning this year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia función del Conjunto Artístico de FPIC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia función del Conjunto Artístico de FPIC
Pyongyang, 30 de mayo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comité de Defensa Nacional de la República Popular Democrática de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejército Popular de Corea, presenció la función de canciones y bailes del Conjunto Artístico de las Fuerzas Populares del Interior de Corea dedicada a su exitosa visita extraoficial a la República Popular China. 
					Cuando el Dirigente apreció en el palco, los espectadores lo acogieron hospitalariamente rindiéndole el máximo honor y las más cálidas felicitaciones. 
					
					En su larga travesía de más de 15 mil ries (10 ries equivalen a 4 kilómetros) por el territorio chino, él hizo enorme aporte al desarrollo de la amistad Corea-China y a la prosperidad de la patria socialista realizando enérgicas actividades exteriores.
					
					Respondiendo con su mano alzada a las entusiastas aclamaciones del público, él mandó su saludo cordial a los militares y civiles de todo el país enfrascados en la dinámica campaña por la construcción de una gran potencia próspera. 
					
					Los artistas presentaron en la escena la obra maestra interpretada con Oungum (instrumento musical coreano) "Azalea", el coro "Nuestro deseo", la danza "Se tornaron maduras las frutas", el dúo mixto con acompañamiento de chelo "Cantemos del partido", el sexteto femenino y coro "Niliri de Moranbong", el cuarteto masculino de guitarristas "Marcha de soldado", el epílogo "Patria, mi amor", entre otras piezas. 
					
					A través de la función, los ejecutantes cantaron en tono patético las imborrables proezas del Dirigente, quien escribió otra página brillante en los anales de la amistad Corea-China y abre con su inagotable energía la nueva era de prosperidad, y manifestaron la férrea convicción y voluntad de nuestro ejército y pueblo de llevar a feliz término de generación en generación la causa revolucionaria del Juche siguiendo con fidelidad al Partido. 
					
					Igualmente, mostraron bien los rasgos ideo-espirituales de los militares de las FPIC de compartir siempre la ideología, el propósito, la vida y el destino con el Dirigente y de cumplir su honrosa misión de la unidad en la primera línea de la lucha clasista para defender como una muralla inexpugnable el más ventajoso régimen socialista centrado en las masas populares. 
					
					El Dirigente respondió cordialmente a las aclamaciones de ejecutantes y espectadores y les felicitó por la exitosa función. 
					
					Muy satisfecho de que los ejecutantes hayan ofrecido esta función magnífica, en que se palpita el espíritu de la época, como miembros de la entidad artística con el espíritu revolucionario de los militares, les agradeció evaluando de altos sus éxitos logrados en la ocasión. 
					
					Expresó la esperanza y convicción de que el Conjunto Artístico de las FPIC cumplirá satisfactoriamente su honrosa misión y deber de trompeteros de la época del Songun al llamar a las masas populares a la revolución y la construcción mediante sus dinámicas actividades artísticas de carácter revolucionario y combativo, y presentó las tareas programáticas que servirán de directiva en la creación artística. 
					
					Disfrutaron la función junto con el Dirigente los cuadros directivos de los organismos del partido, el Estado y las fuerzas armadas, Kim Jong Un, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Hong Sok Hyong, Kim Kyong Hui, Kang Sok Ju, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Yong Il, Kim Yang Gon, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Ju Kyu Chang, U Tong Chuk y Ri Myong Su, los miembros de la Comisión Militar Central del PTC, Kim Kyong Ok, Kim Won Hong, Kim Myong Guk, Kim Yong Chol y Yun Jong Rin, el jefe de departamento del CDN, Hyon Chol Hae, y los funcionarios de las ramas de literatura y arte, prensa e información.

articles.title: CDN ratifica su posición de no tratarse con Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
CDN ratifica su posición de no tratarse con Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 30 de mayo (ATCC) -- Con respecto a que llegan al límite las campañas de confrontación fratricida que lanza la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak contra la República Popular Democrática de Corea, el portavoz del Comité de Defensa Nacional de la República Popular Democrática de Corea hizo pública el día 30 una declaración.
					En estos días, la banda de traidor Lee comente fechorías intensificando el grado de censura a la Dirección de la Revolución y al sagrado sistema socialista de la RPDC, sin tener conciencia del peligro. 
					
					La camarilla del traidor Lee Myung Bak socava la reconciliación y la unidad de la nación y crea obstáculos artificiales en el camino de paz y prosperidad inventando lo que no ha ocurrido y camuflando sus infames políticas antipopulares, señala la nota y prosigue:
					
					Hasta la fecha, esa banda habla de la supuesta "intención verdadera" de la "propuesta hecha en Berlín" insistiendo a menudo en la renuncia nuclear y la "disculpa" de alguien y lleva las relaciones íntercoreanas a la fase irremediablemente catastrófica pretextando el incidente tergiversado y las justas medidas de autodefensa de la RPDC.
					
					Para colmo, está engañando a la opinión pública como si vendría la "situación de emergencia", ansiada por ella, dilatando el tiempo con censurar la magnánima propuesta de la RPDC de abrir la nueva era de reconciliación, cooperación, paz y reunificación mediante el diálogo y negociaciones amplios e incondicionales.
					
					Durante su reciente estancia en Japón, el traidor Lee volvió a acusar el problema nuclear de la RPDC y de vuelta en Seúl, se atrevió a decir con fanfarronería que trataría con "cariño" a alguien.
					
					En esas circunstancias, los belicistas de la capa militar títere del Sur de Corea movilizaron desde el 23 de mayo pasado a muchos uniformados para que dispararan balas en los campos de tiro de Yangju de la provincia de Kyonggi y de la ciudad de Inchon.
					
					En tanto, las fuerzas conservadoras del Sur de Corea, opositoras a la RPDC, insisten hasta en el escenario internacional en que el genocidio de Kwangju del 18 de mayo, cometido por la camarilla militar fascista de Chun Doo Hwan fue "acción de los comandos del Norte".
					
					En estos momentos en que llegan al límite las campañas de confrontación con la RPDC que lanza la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak, el CDN de la RPDC expone al interior y al exterior del país la siguiente posición de principios:
					
					  1. Nuestro ejército y pueblo no se tratarán nunca más con la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak. 
					
					   Que ellos (traidores surcoreanos) esperen cuanto quiera la "situación de emergencia" según su "estrategia de espera" manteniendo la llamada "teoría de principios" hasta que se les llegue la autodestrucción. Esto es la posición de nuestro ejército y pueblo. 
					
					2. Entraremos en la ofensiva general pannacional para poner punto final a la campaña de enfrentamiento anti-RPDC de la camarilla del traidor Lee Myung Bak.
					
					  Esta ofensiva de nuestro ejército y pueblo será la implacable.
					
					  La corriente actual demostrará que una verdadera oleada de democratización se levantará en el mismo bastión de la camarilla del traidor.
					
					  3. Nuestro ejército y pueblo tomarán por ahora las medidas de acción frente a la campaña conflictiva de la camarilla del traidor.
					
					  Ya que ella bloqueó el proceso de reconciliación y cooperación rehusando el diálogo y el contacto, nuestro ejército cortará, como primer paso, las comunicaciones entre los círculos militares del Norte y el Sur de Corea en la zona costera del Mar Este y cerrará la oficina de enlace de comunicaciones en la zona del monte Kumgang, las cuales se mantenían hasta ahora para asegurar en el plano militar el tránsito Norte-Sur.
					
					  En cuanto a la guerra psicológica anti-RPDC que sigue librando la camarilla del traidor con las ambiciones estúpidas, tomaremos reacciones físicas sorpresivas contra cualquier blanco y en cualquier tiempo como ya hemos advertido.

articles.title: En Pyongyang delegación del Grupo Francés para Estudio de Corea
articles.content:
En Pyongyang delegación del Grupo Francés para Estudio de Corea
Pyongyang, 30 de mayo (ATCC) -- Llegó el día 30 a esta capital la delegación del Grupo Francés para el Estudio de Corea integrado por los senadores de varios partidos políticos.
					Encabeza la delegación el senador por el Partido Socialista Francés y presidente del Grupo Senatorial Francés de Estudio de Corea, Jean Claude Frecon.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia ejercicio aéreo anti-RPDC en el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia ejercicio aéreo anti-RPDC en el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 30 de mayo (ATCC) -- Desde el día 23 hasta el 27, los belicistas títeres surcoreanos desarrollaron junto con las fuerzas aéreas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea un ejercicio aéreo de gran envergadura contra la República Popular Democrática de Corea tomando por teatro operacional el espacio aéreo al oeste de la Península Coreana. 
					En esa maniobra se movilizaron más de 50 aviones de combate y los medios de ataque preventivo nuclear. 
					
					Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun publicó el día 29 un comentario individual, que señala en particular:
					
					En el curso de ese entrenamiento muy provocativo y peligroso, los escuadrones de ataque "frustraron" la "provocación de guerra total" por parte de las supuestas "escuadras enemigas" y cumplieron el bombardeo táctico sobre los objetivos claves en la tierra.
					
					Esta aventurera provocación militar parte del intento de atacar preventivamente a la RPDC tras agravar la ya tensa situación de la Península Coreana. 
					
					En estos días, los títeres surcoreanos recrudecen más que nunca las provocaciones militares muy sospechosas contra la RPDC en el Mar Oeste de Corea y en la zona al oeste de la línea de demarcación militar. 
					
					En particular, realizan sucesivamente los ejercicios de fuego naval en las 5 islas y su contorno, que se encuentran en las aguas jurisdiccionales de la RPDC, y los complots de guerra. Y en julio que viene tendrá lugar por primera vez en los alrededores de la isla Paekryong un entrenamiento conjunto de los infantes de marina de EE.UU. y del Sur de Corea. 
					
					Los febriles ejercicios de guerra en la zona occidental del país coinciden con los pasos de la "reforma de defensa", fundamentada en la "consolidación de acción conjunta" entre las fuerzas terrestres, marítimas y aéreas y el cuerpo de marines, tales como la fundación de la "comandancia de defensa de las islas del noroeste". 
					
					Ese hecho es un desafío frontal a la RPDC que se esfuerza en todo lo posible por mejorar las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y por la paz del país. 
					
					La RPDC ama la paz, pero castigará implacablemente a los que se atrevan a atacarla. Esto no es una advertencia vana.
